Function reference

All functions

add_coloredRivers()
Adds colour scaled riverdata to a map
add_inflow()
Add inflow with size proportional circles to the map
add_polygons()
Add polygons to a map
adverse_deviation_from_reference()
Relative adverse deviation from a reference
critical_events()
Count Events of deficits
deviating_hours()
Hours of defficienc within one event
extend_riverTable()
Adds quality categories to the river table
filter_parameter_data()
Filters the parameter data frame by time and sites
getDimensions()
Calculates x- and y-scale based on longitude and lattitude data
interpolate_multipleNA()
Linear interpolation for one or more missing values
load_rivers()
Reads river data
load_timeframes()
Loads a data table containing time frames for events of interest
MisaColor
Color palette for colour scaled rivers
plot_empty_map()
Creates an map Plot, dimensions based on rivers and Qsim output data
QSIM_prepare()
Read Qsim output and save or return table for aggregation and visualization
same_inarow()
Repeating values in a row within a Vector
save_as_excel()
Writes aggregated data of one period of time into Excel file
site_info_from_qsimID()
Get River, Section and location information from Qsim IDs

Developed by Malte Zamzow.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
